title: Le Meme bateau
brief_description: A summary of the work UNICEF is doing to give all children an equal chance in life. Using animated cut-out cartoon style, this charming but pointed allegory tells the story of four children in the same boat. Two from rich countries have shiny oars to row their boat through life’s waters, while the two from poorer countries have only broken oars
